languages.text: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the enemy with the largest number of {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} receives an additional exploit stack. If two or more enemies are tied for the largest number of exploit stacks, one of those enemies is chosen at random.
languages.original_text: В начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативника{/g} противник с самым большим числом уязвимостей получает еще 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимость{/g}. Если таких противников двое или больше, то выбор происходит случайным образом.

traits.locale_text: At the start of the Adept's turn, one enemy with the largest number of clues is affected by an additional clue. If two or more enemies are tied for the largest number of clue stacks, one of those enemies is chosen at random.

At the start of the Adept's turn, the enemy with the largest number of exploits receives an additional exploit stack. If two or more enemies are tied for the largest number of exploit stacks, one of those enemies is chosen at random.

At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the enemy with the largest number of {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} receives an additional exploit stack. If two or more enemies are tied for the largest number of exploit stacks, one of those enemies is chosen at random.

At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the enemy with the largest number of {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} receives an additional exploit stack. If two or more enemies are tied for the largest number of exploit stacks, one of those enemies is chosen at random.

languages.text: В начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативника{/g} противник с самым большим числом уязвимостей получает еще 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимость{/g}. Если таких противников двое или больше, то выбор происходит случайным образом.
languages.original_text: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the enemy with the largest number of {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} receives an additional exploit stack. If two or more enemies are tied for the largest number of exploit stacks, one of those enemies is chosen at random.

traits.locale_text: В начале хода адепта противник с самым большим числом уязвимостей получает еще 1 уязвимость. Если таких противников двое или больше, то выбор происходит случайным образом.
В начале хода адепта противник с самым большим числом уязвимостей получает еще 1 уязвимость. Если таких противников двое или больше, то выбор происходит случайным образом.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}特工{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，研究效果层数最多的敌人额外获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}效果。如果多名敌人的层数相同，则随机选择其中一名敌人。
languages.original_text: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the enemy with the largest number of {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} receives an additional exploit stack. If two or more enemies are tied for the largest number of exploit stacks, one of those enemies is chosen at random.

traits.locale_text: 技师的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}效果层数最多的敌人额外获得1层“研究”效果。如果多名敌人的层数相同，则随机选择其中一名敌人。

languages.text: Al principio del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agente{/g}, el enemigo con mayor número de vulnerabilidades recibe una acumulación extra de {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidad{/g}. Si hay dos enemigos o más empatados en acumulaciones de vulnerabilidad, se elige a uno de ellos al azar.
languages.original_text: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the enemy with the largest number of {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} receives an additional exploit stack. If two or more enemies are tied for the largest number of exploit stacks, one of those enemies is chosen at random.

traits.locale_text: Al principio del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del agente, el enemigo con mayor número de vulnerabilidades recibe una acumulación extra de {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidad{/g}. Si hay dos enemigos o más empatados en acumulaciones de vulnerabilidad, se elige a uno de ellos al azar.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}オペレーター{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、エクスプロイトの数が最も多い敵に追加で{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}がスタックされる。エクスプロイトの最大スタック数が同数の敵が2体以上いる場合、そのうちの1体がランダムに選ばれる。
languages.original_text: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the enemy with the largest number of {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} receives an additional exploit stack. If two or more enemies are tied for the largest number of exploit stacks, one of those enemies is chosen at random.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}オペレーター{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、エクスプロイトの数が最も多い敵に追加で{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}がスタックされる。エクスプロイトの最大スタック数が同数の敵が2体以上いる場合、そのうちの1体がランダムに選ばれる。

languages.text: Zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Agenten{/g} erhält der Gegner mit den meisten {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzung{/g}-Stapeln einen zusätzlichen Ausnutzung-Stapel. Haben zwei Gegner dieselbe Zahl von Ausnutzung-Stapeln, wird einer dieser Gegner nach dem Zufallsprinzip ausgewählt.
languages.original_text: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the enemy with the largest number of {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} receives an additional exploit stack. If two or more enemies are tied for the largest number of exploit stacks, one of those enemies is chosen at random.

traits.locale_text: Zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Agenten erhält der Feind mit der größten Anzahl von {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzen{/g} einen zusätzlichen Ausnutzen-Stapel. Sollten zwei Feinde gemeinsam die höchste Ausnutzen-Anzahl haben, wird einer dieser Feinde nach dem Zufallsprinzip ausgewählt.

languages.text: Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agent{/g}, l'ennemi qui présente le plus grand nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnérabilités{/g} reçoit un cumul de vulnérabilité supplémentaire. En cas d'égalité entre deux ennemis ou plus, l'un d'eux est choisi au hasard.
languages.original_text: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the enemy with the largest number of {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} receives an additional exploit stack. If two or more enemies are tied for the largest number of exploit stacks, one of those enemies is chosen at random.

traits.locale_text: Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agent{/g}, l'ennemi qui présente le plus grand nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnérabilités{/g} reçoit un cumul de vulnérabilité supplémentaire. En cas d'égalité entre deux ennemis ou plus, l'un d'eux est choisi au hasard.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Ajan{/g}'ın {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başlangıcında en yüksek {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}sömürü{/g} birikimine sahip düşman ilave bir sömürü daha alır. En yüksek sömürü birikimine sahip iki veya daha fazla düşman varsa düşmanlardan biri rastgele seçilir.
languages.original_text: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the enemy with the largest number of {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} receives an additional exploit stack. If two or more enemies are tied for the largest number of exploit stacks, one of those enemies is chosen at random.
